senses.sense_definition: A very short tail or a tail that has been cut short.

examples.text: The rabbit flashed its white <w>bobtail</w> as it disappeared into the bushes.
This breed of cat is known for its distinctive <w>bobtail</w>.

senses.sense_definition: An animal, such as a dog or horse, that has a naturally short or cut tail.

examples.text: The farmer rode his old <w>bobtail</w> across the muddy field.
They adopted a friendly <w>bobtail</w> from the animal shelter.

senses.sense_definition: A truck tractor driving without a trailer attached.

examples.text: Driving a <w>bobtail</w> can be bumpy because there is no weight on the rear axles.
The driver parked the <w>bobtail</w> in the small lot behind the diner.

senses.sense_definition: To drive a truck tractor without a trailer attached.

examples.text: He had to <w>bobtail</w> to the next town to pick up a new load.
It is often dangerous to <w>bobtail</w> in wet weather due to reduced traction.
